item.description:
Cambridge SEO Group meets the first monday of each month.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate and search engine marketing professionals to join us.

We also invite local Boston business owners to be our guest website to be reviewed.

This Month Guest Website to be Reviewed:

http://www.melodytrip...

(Please review prior to share your seo tips)

Website Owner:

Matt Casey

CEO

Campuscareercenter.com/CampusRN


This Month's Meeting:

This Month's Guest Speaker: Any Suggestions?

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

Cambridge SEO MeetUp

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization August Meetup
